typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductId as string,
		ProductName as string,
		ProductShortDescription as string,
		ProductDescription as string,
		IntroductionDate as string,
		ServingSizeId as short,
		ServingSizeDescription as string,
		GlobalTradeItemNumber as short,
		EuropeanArticleNumber as short,
		UniversalProductCode as short,
		ProductVolume as short,
		ProductVolumeUomId as string,
		ProductNetWeight as short,
		ProductNetWeightUomId as string,
		ProductGrossWeight as short,
		ProductGrossWeightUomId as string,
		ItemSku as string,
		PrimaryBrandId as string,
		ProductTypeId as string,
		LastModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: 'Product.cdm.json/Product',
	format: 'cdm',
	entityPath: 'product',
	manifestName: 'default',
	corpusPath: 'CorpusGIT',
	partitionPath: 'productoutput',
	folderPath: 'ProductDelta',
	fileSystem: 'deltatest3',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'deltatest',
	truncate: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
